# <a name="organizing-your-outlookcom-mailbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="92126-102">Organizovanje Outlook.com poštanskog sandučeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-102">Organizing your Outlook.com mailbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="92126-103">Lista kontakata je kolekcija e-adresa i korisna je za slanje e-pošte grupi ljudi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-103">A contact list is a collection of email addresses, and is useful for sending email to a group of people.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="92126-104">Da biste kreirali listu kontakata:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-104">To create a contact list:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="92126-105">Idi na [ljude](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-105">Go to [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="92126-106">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-106">.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="92126-107">Na vrhu stranice, izaberite strelicu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-107">At the top of the page, select the arrow</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="92126-108">pored **novog kontakta** , a zatim izaberite **novu listu kontakata**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-108">next to **New contact** and then select **New contact list**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="92126-109">Unesite ime za listu, a zatim dodajte imena ili e-adrese.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-109">Enter a name for the list, and then add names or email addresses.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="92126-110">Izaberite " **Kreiraj**".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-110">Select **Create**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="92126-111">Saznajte više o [kreiranju, prikazu i uređivanju kontakata i listi kontakata u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92126-111">Learn more about how to [create, view, and edit contacts and contact lists in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
